desc: Laundry Detergent capsules that are 100% recyclable and better for the environment. Our laundry detergent is proven to get out tough stains and dirt leaving your clothes smelling fresher for longer. Pinkish Pods is climate positive and waste free offering customers eco alternatives for the home and personal hygiene

layout.text: Meet the Pink Pod redefining laundry
Zero waste. Climate positive. Carbon Negative.
